name: One Tap Boxing
description:
Take on the best in this addictive impossible test of your reactions and determination!

Fight against the toughest opponents, timing your punches and dodges perfectly to knock them down! Only the best of the best will make it through this ultimate boxing challenge and become a prize fighter!

Features:
- Duck dodge and weave to avoid punches
- Fight back by timing the perfect strike to your opponent
- Compete in 7 tournaments from across the world, fight in Europe, America and Asia and take home the belt.
- Unlock 18 unique characters including the chicken, pirate and astronaut.
- Challenging skill based gameplay

Beat all the championships to become the ultimate fighter? Play now for free!
